  • ELEMENT

org.flexiblepower.messaging

Annotation Type Filter


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Filter
    The Filter annotation is used on MessageListeners to limit the type of messages that are received by it.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?>[] value
      The type of messages that should be received by the MessageListener.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] value
        The type of messages that should be received by the MessageListener. When you want to receive all messages, leave this empty (also the default).
        Default:
        {}
